column5: How do you know which reg to follow with a tiger Muskie as them being a Hybrid. DO they fall under Pike or Muskie Regs.  Someone had asked me this the other day and I didnt have an answer.   Cheers  Geoff
My smartass answer would be Musky. Otherwise they'd be called Tiger Pike, no?
Thats what I thought too but I wasn't sureand figure someone here will have the Scientific answer
Would depend on how close the CO's boat was ...the first week of June !
They fall under muskie in the regs.
That's like asking what regs you follow in regards to pickerel or walleye.
I looked in the new regs..there are no size limit or daily limit on pickerel, so I think you can keep all you want....  but there is on walleye  LOL
Oh man. Yer the type of OMNR we need more of.
